entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Grand Bank
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:13 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 4:30 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: 2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 2.7°C
Wind: 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Showers ending this evening then partly cloudy. Amount 2 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries or rain showers beginning late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm except rainfall amount 2 mm along parts of the coast. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to rain or freezing rain in the evening then to ice pellets or freezing rain after midnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Snowfall amount 5 cm north of Terrenceville. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023
